rooms.description: A small entrance hall with a north-facing entry door aligning with Vastu principles for welcoming energy and natural light. Includes wall-mounted hooks for minimalistic storage.
Spacious living area emphasizing natural light with large windows on the north and east facades. Features minimalistic decor with neutral colors.

Compact yet functional kitchen with ventilation hoods and natural lighting, positioned next to the living area for seamless integration. Adheres to local building codes regarding gas connections and electrical outlets.
Utility space including storage and laundry with proper ventilation and lighting. Adheres to local norms for safety and ease of access.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door ensuring maximum natural light and positive energy flow per Vastu principles.
